name: Greeting Message
body: Hello! How can I assist you today?

name: Account Assistance
body: I can help you with your account setup. Could you please provide your account ID?

name: Thank You for Contacting
body: Thank you for reaching out! Let me check that for you.

name: Product Inquiry
body: Can you provide more details about the product you are interested in?

name: Technical Issue
body: I’m sorry to hear about the issue. Could you please describe the problem in more detail?

name: Follow-up Message
body: Just checking in to see if you need further assistance. Let me know if I can help!

name: Escalating to Specialist
body: I’ll forward your request to a specialist. You’ll hear back from us soon.

name: Thank You for Patience
body: Thank you for your patience while I look into this for you.

name: Subscription Renewal
body: Your subscription is about to expire. Would you like assistance with renewing it?

name: Goodbye Message
body: If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out again! Have a great day.
